text: Erebia theano is a butterfly found in the East Palearctic that belongs to the browns family. ==Subspecies== *E. t. theano *E. t. approximata Warren, 1930 Altai *E. t. tshugunovi Korshunov & Ivonin, 1995 West Siberia *E. t. shoria Korshunov & Ivonin, 1995 Kuznetsky Alatau ==Biology== The larva feeds on Poaceae. ==See also== *List of butterflies of Russia ==References== ==External links== * Images representing Erebia theano at Barcodes of Life *SZMN images Category:Satyrinae
title: Erebia theano
